segments.text: The kids in this kitchen are quite the schemers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is very boldly stealing cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is a willing accomplice, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at their nerve, doing it while the adult is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the stool is tilting is genuinely alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could go over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, those cookies are going everywhere, what a mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And think about the broken plate he's holding!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole operation is fraught with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The womanâ€™s back is to them, creating the perfect opportunity for mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I guess children will always find a way to get their treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this feels particularly risky and ill-advised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't cause too much damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR
